title: Hour 1 - Chris Canty (04-03-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Chris Canty (04-03-20)
description:
FOX Sports Radio hosts Jason Smith and Rob Parker are in for Dan and the Danettes, and the guys explain how the Detroit Lions' affinity for Tua Tagovailoa (or lack thereof) could end up re-shaping the NFL moving forward and debate whether or not Tom Brady will be able to lead the Buccaneers to the playoffs in his first season in Tampa Bay. Plus, Super Bowl champion and FS1 NFL analyst Chris Canty stops by for a little verbal sparring with the guys over Brady's legacy and his supposedly diminishing skills.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
